haystack_sessions.content: I graduated with a degree in Business Administration, which has helped in my new role.
Congratulations on your degree in Business Administration! Let's also set up a system for paperwork and documentation.
I just got a new Instant Pot and some kitchen knivesâ€”can you give me beginner recipe ideas and cleaning tips?
Great! Start with simple soups and rice dishes. For cleaning, follow the manufacturer's care instructions and avoid abrasive pads on knife blades.
